00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PreStream
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018

00034 
00035  SUBROUTINE PreStream
00036 
00037 ! Common Variables
00038  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00039  USE Domain,    ONLY : inv12, ni, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00040  USE FluidParams
00041  USE LBMParams
00042  IMPLICIT NONE
00043 
00044 ! Local Variables
00045  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js, ie2, iw2, jn2, js2
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Ff, Fg, GX, GY, UG, ux, uy, U_sq, v
00047  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: rhon, tau, invtau, AX, rho3, psi3, invCsRho
00048  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradPsiX, gradPsiY, gradRhoSqX, gradRhoSqY
00049  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoXX2, gradRhoXY2, gradRhoYX2, gradRhoYY2
00050  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoU, gradPsiU, gradRhoPsi
00051  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(0:8) :: feq, geq, Gam, GamW
00052  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:8) :: gradPsiD, gradRhoD
00053 
00054 
00055 !-------- Collision-Stream Loop ------------------------------------------------
00056  DO j = ymin, ymax
00057    DO i = xmin, xmax
00058 ! Define some local values
00059      rhon  = rho(i,j)
00060      ux    = u(i,j,1)
00061      uy    = u(i,j,2)
00062      U_sq  = 0.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy )
00063      tau   = tauL + (rhon - rhoL)*tauRhoStar
00064      invtau   = 0.5D0/tau
00065      invCsRho = invCs_sq*rhon
00066      rho3     = 3.D0*rho(i,j)
00067      psi3     = 3.D0*psi(i,j)
00068 
00069 ! Identify first neighbors
00070      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00071      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00072      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00073      js = ni(i,j,4)
00074 
00075 ! Identify second neighbors
00076      ie2 = ni(ie,j,1)
00077      jn2 = ni(i,jn,2)
00078      iw2 = ni(iw,j,3)
00079      js2 = ni(i,js,4)
00080 
00081 !--------- Standard Derivatives (1/12 factor embedded in kappa_12) -------------
00082 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00083      gradPsiX = ( 4.D0*( psi(ie,j ) - psi(iw,j ) ) + psi(ie,jn) - psi(iw,js) &
00084               + psi(ie,js) - psi(iw,jn) )*inv12
00085 
00086      gradPsiY = ( 4.D0*( psi(i ,jn) - psi(i ,js) ) + psi(ie,jn) - psi(iw,js) &
00087               + psi(iw,jn) - psi(ie,js) )*inv12
00088 
00089 ! Gradient of the square of the density gradient
00090      gradRhoSqX = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(ie,j ) - gradRhoSq(iw,j ) )           &
00091                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(iw,js) + gradRhoSq(ie,js) &
00092                 - gradRhoSq(iw,jn)
00093 
00094      gradRhoSqY = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(i ,jn) - gradRhoSq(i ,js) )           &
00095                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(iw,js) + gradRhoSq(iw,jn) &
00096                 - gradRhoSq(ie,js)
00097 
00098 ! Second derivatives of rho
00099      gradRhoXX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXX(ie,j ) - gradRhoXX(iw,j ) )           &
00100                 + gradRhoXX(ie,jn) - gradRhoXX(iw,js) + gradRhoXX(ie,js) &
00101                 - gradRhoXX(iw,jn)
00102 
00103      gradRhoXY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(i ,jn) - gradRhoXY(i ,js) )           &
00104                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js) + gradRhoXY(iw,jn) &
00105                 - gradRhoXY(ie,js)
00106 
00107      gradRhoYX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(ie,j ) - gradRhoXY(iw,j ) )           &
00108                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js) + gradRhoXY(ie,js) &
00109                 - gradRhoXY(iw,jn)
00110 
00111      gradRhoYY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoYY(i ,jn) - gradRhoYY(i ,js) )           &
00112                 + gradRhoYY(ie,jn) - gradRhoYY(iw,js) + gradRhoYY(iw,jn) &
00113                 - gradRhoYY(ie,js)
00114 
00115 !--------- Directional derivatives (Second Order Mixed Differencing Scheme) ----
00116 ! Gradient of the density rho
00117      AX = rho(ie2,j) - rho(i,j)
00118      gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( - rho(ie2,j  ) + 4.D0*rho(ie,j ) - rho3 )
00119      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(1) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,j) - rho(iw,j) )
00120 
00121      AX = rho(i,jn2) - rho(i,j)
00122      gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( - rho(i  ,jn2) + 4.D0*rho(i ,jn) - rho3 )
00123      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(2) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,jn) - rho(i,js) )
00124 
00125      AX = rho(iw2,j) - rho(i,j)
00126      gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( - rho(iw2,j  ) + 4.D0*rho(iw,j ) - rho3 )
00127      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(3) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,j) - rho(ie,j) )
00128 
00129      AX = rho(i,js2) - rho(i,j)
00130      gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( - rho(i  ,js2) + 4.D0*rho(i ,js) - rho3 )
00131      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(4) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,js) - rho(i,jn) )
00132 
00133      AX = rho(ie2,jn2) - rho(i,j)
00134      gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( - rho(ie2,jn2) + 4.D0*rho(ie,jn) - rho3 )
00135      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(5) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,jn) - rho(iw,js) )
00136 
00137      AX = rho(iw2,jn2) - rho(i,j)
00138      gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( - rho(iw2,jn2) + 4.D0*rho(iw,jn) - rho3 )
00139      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(6) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,jn) - rho(ie,js) )
00140 
00141      AX = rho(iw2,js2) - rho(i,j)
00142      gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( - rho(iw2,js2) + 4.D0*rho(iw,js) - rho3 )
00143      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(7) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,js) - rho(ie,jn) )
00144 
00145      AX = rho(ie2,js2) - rho(i,j)
00146      gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( - rho(ie2,js2) + 4.D0*rho(ie,js) - rho3 )   
00147      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(8) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,js) - rho(iw,jn) )
00148 
00149 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00150      AX = psi(ie2,j) - psi(i,j)
00151      gradPsiD(1) = 0.5D0*( - psi(ie2,j  ) + 4.D0*psi(ie,j ) - psi3 )
00152      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(1) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(1) = 0.5D0*( psi(ie,j) - psi(iw,j) )
00153 
00154      AX = psi(i,jn2) - psi(i,j)
00155      gradPsiD(2) = 0.5D0*( - psi(i  ,jn2) + 4.D0*psi(i ,jn) - psi3 )
00156      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(2) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(2) = 0.5D0*( psi(i,jn) - psi(i,js) )
00157 
00158      AX = psi(iw2,j) - psi(i,j)
00159      gradPsiD(3) = 0.5D0*( - psi(iw2,j  ) + 4.D0*psi(iw,j ) - psi3 )
00160      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(3) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(3) = 0.5D0*( psi(iw,j) - psi(ie,j) )
00161 
00162      AX = psi(i,js2) - psi(i,j)
00163      gradPsiD(4) = 0.5D0*( - psi(i  ,js2) + 4.D0*psi(i ,js) - psi3 )
00164      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(4) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(4) = 0.5D0*( psi(i,js) - psi(i,jn) )
00165 
00166      AX = psi(ie2,jn2) - psi(i,j)
00167      gradPsiD(5) = 0.5D0*( - psi(ie2,jn2) + 4.D0*psi(ie,jn) - psi3 )
00168      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(5) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(5) = 0.5D0*( psi(ie,jn) - psi(iw,js) )
00169 
00170      AX = psi(iw2,jn2) - psi(i,j)
00171      gradPsiD(6) = 0.5D0*( - psi(iw2,jn2) + 4.D0*psi(iw,jn) - psi3 )
00172      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(6) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(6) = 0.5D0*( psi(iw,jn) - psi(ie,js) )
00173 
00174      AX = psi(iw2,js2) - psi(i,j)
00175      gradPsiD(7) = 0.5D0*( - psi(iw2,js2) + 4.D0*psi(iw,js) - psi3 )
00176      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(7) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(7) = 0.5D0*( psi(iw,js) - psi(ie,jn) )
00177 
00178      AX = psi(ie2,js2) - psi(i,j)
00179      gradPsiD(8) = 0.5D0*( - psi(ie2,js2) + 4.D0*psi(ie,js) - psi3 )   
00180      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(8) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(8) = 0.5D0*( psi(ie,js) - psi(iw,jn) )
00181 
00182 !--------- Equilibrium values of Gamma, and the distribution functions ---------
00183      GamW(0) = W0C*U_sq
00184      Gam(0)  = W0 - GamW(0)
00185      feq(0)  = Gam(0)*rhon
00186      geq(0)  = W0C*p(i,j) - rhon*GamW(0)
00187 
00188      GamW(1) = W1C*( ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00189      Gam(1)  = W1 + GamW(1)
00190      feq(1)  = Gam(1)*rhon
00191      geq(1)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(1)
00192 
00193      GamW(2) = W1C*( uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00194      Gam(2)  = W1 + GamW(2)
00195      feq(2)  = Gam(2)*rhon
00196      geq(2)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(2)
00197 
00198      GamW(3) = W1C*( -ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00199      Gam(3)  = W1 + GamW(3)
00200      feq(3)  = Gam(3)*rhon
00201      geq(3)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(3)
00202 
00203      GamW(4) = W1C*( -uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00204      Gam(4)  = W1 + GamW(4)
00205      feq(4)  = Gam(4)*rhon
00206      geq(4)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(4)
00207 
00208      v       = ux + uy
00209      GamW(5) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00210      Gam(5)  = W2 + GamW(5)
00211      feq(5)  = Gam(5)*rhon
00212      geq(5)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(5)
00213 
00214      v       = -ux + uy
00215      GamW(6) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00216      Gam(6)  = W2 + GamW(6)
00217      feq(6)  = Gam(6)*rhon
00218      geq(6)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(6)
00219 
00220      v       = -ux - uy
00221      GamW(7) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00222      Gam(7)  = W2 + GamW(7)
00223      feq(7)  = Gam(7)*rhon
00224      geq(7)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(7)
00225 
00226      v        = ux - uy
00227      GamW(8) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00228      Gam(8)  = W2 + GamW(8)
00229      feq(8)  = Gam(8)*rhon
00230      geq(8)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(8)
00231 
00232 ! Define directional terms that are common to all (f,g) components
00233      gradRhoU   = ux*gradRhoX(i,j) + uy*gradRhoY(i,j)
00234      gradPsiU   = ux*gradPsiX      + uy*gradPsiY
00235      gradRhoPsi = gradRhoU - invCsRho*gradPsiU
00236      GX = kappa_12*( gradRhoSqX - gradRhoXX2 - gradRhoXY2 )
00237      GY = kappa_12*( gradRhoSqY - gradRhoYX2 - gradRhoYY2 )
00238      UG = ux*GX + uy*GY
00239 
00240 !--------- Collision and stream for the f and g distribution functions ---------
00241 ! Direction 0
00242      Ff = Gam(0)*gradRhoPsi
00243      Fg = GamW(0)*gradRhoU + invCs_sq*Gam(0)*UG
00244      fbar(i ,j ,0) = f(i,j,0) + invtau*( feq(0) - f(i,j,0) ) - 0.5D0*Ff
00245      gbar(i ,j ,0) = g(i,j,0) + invtau*( geq(0) - g(i,j,0) ) - 0.5D0*Fg
00246 
00247 ! Direction 1
00248      Ff = Gam(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(1) - gradRhoPsi )
00249      Fg = GamW(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(1)*( GX - UG )
00250      fbar(ie,j ,1) = f(i,j,1) + invtau*( feq(1) - f(i,j,1) ) + 0.5D0*Ff
00251      gbar(ie,j ,1) = g(i,j,1) + invtau*( geq(1) - g(i,j,1) ) + 0.5D0*Fg
00252 
00253 ! Direction 2
00254      Ff = Gam(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(2) - gradRhoPsi )
00255      Fg = GamW(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(2)*( GY - UG )
00256      fbar(i ,jn,2) = f(i,j,2) + invtau*( feq(2) - f(i,j,2) ) + 0.5D0*Ff
00257      gbar(i ,jn,2) = g(i,j,2) + invtau*( geq(2) - g(i,j,2) ) + 0.5D0*Fg
00258 
00259 ! Direction 3
00260      Ff = Gam(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(3) - gradRhoPsi )
00261      Fg = GamW(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(3)*( GX + UG )
00262      fbar(iw,j ,3) = f(i,j,3) + invtau*( feq(3) - f(i,j,3) ) + 0.5D0*Ff
00263      gbar(iw,j ,3) = g(i,j,3) + invtau*( geq(3) - g(i,j,3) ) + 0.5D0*Fg
00264 
00265 ! Direction 4
00266      Ff = Gam(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(4) - gradRhoPsi )
00267      Fg = GamW(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(4)*( GY + UG )
00268      fbar(i ,js,4) = f(i,j,4) + invtau*( feq(4) - f(i,j,4) ) + 0.5D0*Ff
00269      gbar(i ,js,4) = g(i,j,4) + invtau*( geq(4) - g(i,j,4) ) + 0.5D0*Fg
00270 
00271 ! Direction 5
00272      Ff = Gam(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(5) - gradRhoPsi )
00273      Fg = GamW(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(5)*( GX + GY - UG )
00274      fbar(ie,jn,5) = f(i,j,5) + invtau*( feq(5) - f(i,j,5) ) + 0.5D0*Ff
00275      gbar(ie,jn,5) = g(i,j,5) + invtau*( geq(5) - g(i,j,5) ) + 0.5D0*Fg
00276 
00277 ! Direction 6
00278      Ff = Gam(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(6) - gradRhoPsi )
00279      Fg = GamW(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(6)*( GX - GY + UG )
00280      fbar(iw,jn,6) = f(i,j,6) + invtau*( feq(6) - f(i,j,6) ) + 0.5D0*Ff
00281      gbar(iw,jn,6) = g(i,j,6) + invtau*( geq(6) - g(i,j,6) ) + 0.5D0*Fg
00282 
00283 ! Direction 7
00284      Ff = Gam(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(7) - gradRhoPsi )
00285      Fg = GamW(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(7)*( GX + GY + UG )
00286      fbar(iw,js,7) = f(i,j,7) + invtau*( feq(7) - f(i,j,7) ) + 0.5D0*Ff
00287      gbar(iw,js,7) = g(i,j,7) + invtau*( geq(7) - g(i,j,7) ) + 0.5D0*Fg
00288 
00289 ! Direction 8
00290      Ff = Gam(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(8) - gradRhoPsi )
00291      Fg = GamW(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(8)*( GX - GY - UG )
00292      fbar(ie,js,8) = f(i,j,8) + invtau*( feq(8) - f(i,j,8) ) + 0.5D0*Ff
00293      gbar(ie,js,8) = g(i,j,8) + invtau*( geq(8) - g(i,j,8) ) + 0.5D0*Fg
00294 
00295    END DO
00296  END DO
00297 
00298  RETURN
00299  END SUBROUTINE PreStream
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:18 2008 for LL-2D-STD by  1.5.6
